snippet: President Obama’s proposal for expanding high-quality preschool education, which aims at excellence, deserves a fair hearing.
abstract: Editorial maintains Pres Obama's State of the Union proposal to expand high-quality preschool education deserves a fair hearing from members of both parties.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s proposal for expanding high-quality preschool education, which aims at excellence, deserves a fair hearing.

headline.seo: Getting Obama’s Preschool Education Plan Right
